senses.synonym: 14281281-n (inflammation of the alveoli in the lungs caused by inhaling dust; with repeated exposure the condition may become chronic);14281495-n (inflammation in the socket of a tooth; sometimes occurs after a tooth is extracted and a blood clot fails to form)
